title: The best early Chain Reaction Cycles Black Friday deals | Big discounts on handlebars, dropper posts and pedals
content:
We’ve poured through Chain Reaction’s early Black Friday deals to bring you the best offers from the online retailer.

Here are our selection of the best offers we’ve found so far and you can also check out Wiggle’s Black Friday Deals.

Best Chain Reaction Black Friday Deals

Brand-X Ascend Dropper Seatpost – £139.99 £99.99 (save 29%)

Chain Reaction Cycles

A dropper post is one of the best mountain bike upgrades you can make, allowing you to get the saddle out of the way on technical descents.

Brand-X is one of Wiggle CRC’s in-house component brands and the Ascend is its first-generation offering. We highly rate the Ascend II, which replaces this post.

Your frame will need to have internal routing to run this dropper post and it’s currently available in 100, 125 and 150mm-travel options, in both a 30.9 and 31.6mm seatpost diameter.

The post even comes with a lever that’s suitable for mountain bike handlebars with a 22.2mm diameter.

  • Buy the Brand-X Ascend Dropper Seatpost with 29 per cent discount from Chain Reaction 

Prime Primavera Aero Carbon Road Handlebar – £159.99 £99.99 (save 38%)

Prime

A carbon handlebar is an underrated upgrade for your road bike, further damping vibrations that transmit to your hands over an aluminium alternative.

This aero handlebar is constructed from high-modulus carbon fibre and Prime claims it weighs 228g in its 42cm guise. The tops have an aero profile to cheat the wind and sport a relatively short 76.5mm reach, combined with a 122mm drop.

The handlebar is available in widths from 36 to 44cm and features internal routing, as well as Shimano Di2 compatibility.

  • Buy the Prime Primavera Aero Carbon Road Handlebar with a 38 per cent discount from Chain Reaction 

Nukeproof Horizon Carbon Riser Bar – £99.99 £49.99 (save 50%)

Chain Reaction Cycles

Chain Reaction also has a carbon mountain bike handlebar equivalent for shredders.

Nukeproof’s Horizon Carbon Riser Bar has been designed to be both lightweight and comfortable, thanks to the inclusion of a glass-fibre layer for additional damping and reinforcement.

The bar is available in 800mm widths, in 12, 25 and 38mm-rise options. If that’s too wide for you, remember you can always cut a handlebar down to size.

Nukeproof is so confident in this bar that it backs it with a lifetime warranty.

  • Buy the Nukeproof Horizon Carbon Riser Bar with a 50 per cent discount from Chain Reaction 

Nukeproof Neutron EVO Flat Pedals – £34.99 From £16.99 (save 51%)

Ian Linton / Our Media

Nukeproof’s latest Neutron EVO flat pedals got new pedal pin placements in 2022 for improved grip.

The body is nylon-reinforced composite and they spin on a chromoly steel axle.

The pedal is available in 15 colours, so there’s sure to be an option to match your bike.

Senior technical editor Alex Evans found the pedals to be a cost-effective way of accessing reasonably good levels of grip in his 3.5-star review.

  • Buy the Nukeproof Neutron EVO Flat Pedals with a 51 per cent discount from Chain Reaction
